name: Phyllo Meat "Pie"
description: This delicious flaky meat pie can be made entirely in your Wok! Add Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning to ground beef for an unforgettable flavour the entire family will love.

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning or Beef Stroganoff Seasoning

preparation: In Wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Crumble in beef and add seasoning. Cook, 3–4 min, breaking up chunks as needed.
Stir in peas, corn, water, and Worcestershire sauce. Cover; reduce heat to medium and simmer until heated through.

Meanwhile, brush phyllo sheets with butter. Cut each sheet in two. Using your hands, loosely scrunch the sheets into individual balls (you should have 10), then place side-by-side on top of the pie filling in wok.
Bake, uncovered, until phyllo is golden brown and cooked, about 8 min.
tips: Phyllo pastry sheets are found in the frozen section of the grocery store. For best results, follow instructions on the package. In general, thaw pastry in refrigerator overnight. Unroll and remove the sheets you need—keep those moist by placing a damp towel on top. Wrap remaining dough in plastic wrap and re-freeze up to 3 months.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kind—free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
